leftNode.content:
(select *
    from games
where metacritic is null
)t1

where t1.id not in
    (select distinct id
        from games_platforms
    where platform_id in
        (select id
            from platforms 
        where name in ('PlayStation','Xbox','Nintendo','SEGA'))
    )

and t1.id not in
    (select distinct id
        from games_tags 
    where tag_id in 
        (select id
            from tags
        where name like '%solitaire%' 
        or name like '%single%')
    )
order by t1.rating desc

rightNode.content:

    )
order by t1.rating desc
